item.title: Does 'Clown Shoes' Refer to Something Other Than Shoes?
item.description: What does 'clown shoes' refer to? Can someone say "That's clown shoes." and be done with their sentence, properly?

item.title: On the Saying 'God is Odd'
item.description: A brief discourse on the saying "God is odd".
